query: How has my body weight changed over the past year?
resource_summaries: This is an observation record of a patient's body weight taken on February 9, 2021, showing a value of 100.3 kg.
answer: Based on the observation record from February 9, 2021, your body weight was 100.3 kg at that time. Unfortunately, without additional data points, I am unable to provide information on how your body weight has changed over the past year.
